title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2138/93 of 28 July 1993 amending Regulations (EEC) No 1912/92 and (EEC) No 2254/92 laying down detailed implementing rules for the specific measures for supplying the Canary Islands with products from the beef and veal sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2138/93 of 28 July 1993 amending Regulations (EEC) No 1912/92 and (EEC) No 2254/92 laying down detailed implementing rules for the specific measures for supplying the Canary Islands with products from the beef and  veal sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 378, 23. 12. 1992, p. 23.
(3) OJ No L 179, 1. 7. 1992, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 159, 1. 7. 1993, p. 75.
(5) OJ No L 192, 11. 7. 1992, p. 31.
(6) OJ No L 160, 1. 7. 1993, p. 39.
(7) OJ No L 219, 4. 8. 1992, p. 34.
